name: Angry Boss Space
description:
Angry Boss Space is a satire game about the movie Office Space. When I saw the theme for the VimJam 2 I figured this would be a great opportunity to practice making a better boss. I mostly did this over the weekend work my butt to the bone sitting down to make it quick, but well made as I could in the time frame. There is a sub boss once you beat the Angry boss.

Controls

Move: W,A,S, D

Shoot and move cursor: Mouse and Left Click

Restart: Press R

Power Ups

T shirt = Free casual day invincible for brief movement

Red Stapler = Shoot staples with your stapler

Bat = extra damage
